2025-12-19PMOPublic Service Employment ActAppointment of the Deputy Secretary to the Cabinet (Economic Policy) and Economic Advisor to the Clerk of the Privy Council, Privy Council OfficeAppointment of John McArthur of Washington D.C., United States of America, to be Deputy Secretary to the Cabinet (Economic Policy) and Economic Advisor to the Clerk of the Privy Council, Privy Council Office, to hold office during pleasure, effective February 2, 2026.N/A
subject: Appointment of the Deputy Secretary to the Cabinet (Economic Policy) and Economic Advisor to the Clerk of the Privy Council, Privy Council Office
precis: Appointment of John McArthur of Washington D.C., United States of America, to be Deputy Secretary to the Cabinet (Economic Policy) and Economic Advisor to the Clerk of the Privy Council, Privy Council Office, to hold office during pleasure, effective February 2, 2026.
